author: Quest AI (www.quest.ai)
description: Convert XD to live websites instantly. Export multiple artboards of different sizes and Quest automatically creates responsive pages. Using Quest AIâ€™s no-code editor, you can add timeline-based actions, videos, music and animations to build rich and interactive experiences without writing any code. Build web sites, landing pages, demo modules, etc.  Add custom fonts, input fields, button components, custom methods or libraries easily. One-click build delivers responsive experience across all devices. Analytics and CDN hosting built-in - so your experience is ready for your audience instantly.
releaseNotes:
- Convert XD into live websites more easily than ever. Our biggest release to date packs a powerful set of features to build sophisticated custom experiences
- Introducing Features - a new modular way to add interactions to various elements and groups
- New features include Click/Tap, Mouse Over, Mouse Out, Click Tap Outside, bounding box to set clickable area of an element or group and new action to Set Visibility  - Groups are now on par with elements with support for all the properties and interactions
- Easily build a nav menu bar with dropdowns
- Text Enhancements including line height, character spacing, partial text clicks, multi-style text
- Brand new minimal look and feel that looks cleaner and improves usability 
- Collapsible panels to reduce clutter and improve productivity
- Easy undo/redo with keyboard and support for unlimited undo/redo of all user actions within the session
- Override controls to better synchronize your edits between design document and in Quest
name: Quest AI
